msbt.message: Hey, that shovel of yours represents some serious power. Use it wisely, .
Going buggin'? You know, bug- hunting, bug-catching, bug- gathering Whatever you call it.
Nice fishing rod you've got there. I still remember the first fish I ever caught
Hey, glad to see you've got your watering can. It's good tokeep plants wetobviously

Hey, buddy! Take it easy there!Whew. Sorry, I'm just not used to folks walking around with real axes. I've always been a city boy! Good luck chopping down trees or shaving or whatever it is you're going to do with that thing!
Whoa, what are you hunting, ?I'm not much for traditional hunting, but you should see me shopping. It's like huntingfor bargains.
Whoa! Now THAT is a cool trick.If I could instantly change into any outfit I wanted would be a more interesting place!
Whoa, look at you! You're making into a regular metropolis with these roads! I hope that means we get some designer clothes outlets, like & .
Hey, keep up the good work, . You're building a cliff, right? When you're done, it'll be a great place to stand and sing at the top of my lungs for all to hear!
Whoa, is this a secret project? You've got nothing to hide from me, . I assume you have all the relevant permits?<10_4 /> Ha HA! Just kidding. Permits are for the timid.

Hey there, sparky! You're looking particularly explosive today.What? It's just that thing you're holding. Try pulling the string sometime. Not NOW, but sometime. Oh, I've already said too much. Don't wanna spoil the surprise!

Whoa, you could probably climb to the very top with that thing, huh?Imagine the view from the peak Rubbing elbows with celebrities, eating the finest That's one of those social climbing ladders, right?
Hey, is that one of those vaulting poles I've been hearing about?UghI want one of those SO MUCH. I don't care about vaultingâ€”I just want to have the latest cool thing!
Oh, you have one of those tweeter things, huh? Can you play any music on it, ?Hit me with some -core and I'll drop the beat. Record deal, here we come!
Ooh, you've got yourself a bubble blower, .You know, in the right kind of club, they charge extra for bubbles in your
Is that a pinwheel you've got there? It's such a simple toyand yet so captivating, Ugh, I've got to stop looking at it. I'll get hypnotized and buy online. Again.
Oh, you've got one of those uchiwa fans, !For when you want to cool downin style.
Well, look who's got a sparkler! Are you gonna light it up now, or are you waiting for something?The ones that burn the brightest are also the ones that burn the longest, right? Just like in life?
Cool balloon, ! You don't happen to have, like, 300 more of them, do you?Ah, I was just hoping you could release them while I play riff in slow motion.It's for a job application.
Hey, ! Been catching many bugs?You haven't caught a single one? Well, that's OK. I'm sure the bugs are pretty psyched about it!
Hey, if you're trying to catch bugs like thatYour footwork needs work! Or maybe you just need cooler bug-catching shoes, !
That look in your eyelike you're about to go on a bug-catching frenzy If I were a bug, I'd be backing slowly away. That's how good you are!
Whoa! Something tells me I'm in the presence of a bug-catching legend.Is it true, ? Are you the one the bugs speak of in hushed tones?
Wait, wait, wait You caught ALL of the bugs? ALL OF THEM?How is that even possible? And, likewhat are you even doing with all of those bugs?!
Whoa, you haven't caught any fish yet? Youyou do know that you can catch fish, right? But don't worry about it. You can take your time. There are literally plenty of fish in the sea!
Hey, if you're having trouble catching lots of fish, I've got a pro tip for you. Just fish a whole bunch! I'm terrible at fishing, but even I've caught a bunch of them just by trying a lot.
Mmm, you smell that? It's the smell of a seasoned angler.No, I'm not saying you smell like fish! You smell like success!
So, what's on the agenda today? Fish, fish, and more fish?I'm just teasing. You're so good at fishing, it's the only thing I've got left

Yo, I heard that you actually caught ALL of the fish. ALL of them!You're the boss of the bobber, the ruler of the reel! Fish are your forte! I bow down to your, uh Let's just say I'm jealous and leave it at that, !
I would ask what you're doing, but I think I figured it out.The love you're showing these plants by watering in the rain is truly admirable. I'm impressed, !
Look at you, out watering in these conditions!Wait, does it actually help the flowers to have ice cubes dumped on them?
Hey, so you're part of the reason why 's flowers and plants look so good. Thanks!
You're really making a statement with that umbrella of yours.What that statement isI'm not sure.
Ooh, that umbrella is nice! I'd rock that in any weather.Of course, it does seem especially functional right now
Hey, your umbrella really goes with the cherry blossoms!Plus it keeps 'em out of your hair! Fashion and function, !
Rock on, Ultraviolet Defender Red!<10_4 /> I've been watching too many superhero movies
Rock on, Ultraviolet Defender Yellow!<10_4 /> I've been watching too many superhero movies
Rock on, Ultraviolet Defender Green!<10_4 /> I've been watching too many superhero movies
